q: why do the chef knock the handle of the round pot
pred: The chef is likely using the handle of the round pot to stir the egg and cheese mixture. This action helps to ensure that the ingredients are well combined and evenly distributed throughout the mixture. Stirring also helps to prevent the ingredients from sticking to the bottom of the pot, which can lead to uneven cooking or burning. By using the handle of the round pot, the chef can easily and efficiently stir the mixture without having to lift the pot off the stove.
